Understate: The claim understates that the hospital was not built by the Hawkeyes football team, but by the University of Iowa.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that the Hawkeyes football team built the hospital.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the Hawkeyes football team built the hospital, when in fact it was the University of Iowa.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the hospital was not built by the Hawkeyes football team, but by the University of Iowa.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the hospital was not built by the Hawkeyes football team.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the involvement of the Hawkeyes football team in building the hospital.
